document_data.caption: A map of the Eastern Plains, [[1374 DR]]
document_data.name: Thunder River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thunder River''', also known as the '''Thunderflow''', was a river in northeastern [[Cormyr]] that flowed out from the [[Thunder Peaks]].
document_data.Geography: Thunder River flowed west out of the Thunder Peaks, passing through the [[Eastern Plains]] and by the [[Hullack Forest]], On the Eastern Plains side, the towns of [[Hultail]]
document_data.Trade: A lot of merchantile ships traveled along the Thunder River between Cormyr, the village of Hultail, and [[the Dalelands]]. The town of [[Ghars]], for example, had ships navigate the river in order to export goods to Hultail.
document_data.History: Prior to the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the name Thunderflow could be seen on maps of the region. By the 14{{th}} century DR, the name had fallen out of favor. In the late 15{{th}} century DR, following the [[Spellplague]], one could find maps of the region using the name Thunderflow once again.<ref>{{Cite dragon/365/Backdrop: Cormyr|18}}
